name: Shrimp with Tomato Sauce

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Pizza Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, combine first 4 ingredients and simmer for 10 minutes with lid off. Sauce will thicken slightly.
Lay thawed shrimp on paper towel to remove excess moisture. Add shrimp to sauce and cook for 2 minutes or until shrimp is heated through.
Season with Sea Salt and Pepper.
Serve over steamed rice or with your favourite cooked pasta. Top with a little crumbled Feta cheese if desired.
tips: For robust Italian flavour, try Epicure Pesto Sauce Mix instead of Souvlaki Seasoning and top with grated Parmesan cheese.

products.name: Toasted Onion
summary: Sweet flavour of lightly toasted onion.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavors and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!
